meanings: wish, hope, want, (formal) desire, (간절히) long for, (기대하다) look forward to

vlive.korean: 들킬 수도 있다 - 들키기를 바라는 거 아니야? They could get caught. - Do you want them to get caught? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
